attributes.action: Make motorycyle riding compulsory as a road safety initiative
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Before anyone is allowed to take driving lessons in a car - Make it compulsory that they learn to ride a motorbike & pass their test. The motorcycle testing proceduere is far more advanced than the current car test - Anyone who has ridden a motorbike will be far more aware of other road users as result of the experience, making them safer road users in any other subsequent vehicles they should drive.
